data.message: Hello Facebook, I'm wondering if anyone would ever like to help fix a problem I have had, and have asked for help in the past with.  My name is Beau, not Booey (nickname)  YOU made me change my name from Beau 19 months ago, for no reason and I can't change it back, EVER.  There has to be something you can do.  It's beyond ridiculous, and I don't want to start a new account either.

replies.message: Hi there. Have you tried these steps to change your name? Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1RH6Uq0. -Rey
Yes, and nothing, I have tried it several times.  Also I wouldn't be talking to you if it wasn't the last possible step
